mapper.select: select count(f.file_id) as fileCount, sum(p.praise_count) as praiseCount from file f,praise p
select sum(v.count_time) as visitCount from visitors v
select filetype as fileType, COUNT(file_id) as fileCount from file GROUP by filetype
select count(guid) as unreadCount from message where delete_flag = 0 and state = 0
